Overview[edit | edit source]

Main article: Thieving training

Thieving is heavily modified by one tier 1 relic.

  • Endless Harvest is not directly beneficial to Thieving training.
  • Production Master is not directly beneficial to Thieving training.
  • Skilling Prodigy allows players to thieve with greater success rates due to its +12 visible level boost.

Training[edit | edit source]

Thievable NPCs[edit | edit source]

Loot from these NPCs is located on their respective pages.

Name Level Exp./ Hour Area(s) Notes
Man/Woman 1 Misthalin✓ Kandarin✓ Asgarnia✓ Desert✓ Karamja✓ Wilderness✓ Found all around Gielinor.
Farmer 10 Misthalin✓ Kandarin✓ Commonly found in Lumbridge farms and north of Ardougne.
Female H.A.M. member 15 Misthalin✓ Wearing H.A.M. clothing reduces chances of being jailed, but does not increase the success rate.[t 1]
Male H.A.M. member 20 Misthalin✓ Wearing H.A.M. clothing reduces chances of being jailed, but does not increase the success rate.[t 1]
Warrior woman/Al-Kharid warrior 25 Misthalin✓ Kandarin✓ Desert✓ Warrior women are commonly found in back of Varrock Palace on the ground floor.
Rogue 32 Wilderness✓ Found deep in Wilderness south-west of Mage Arena or in far north-east wilderness at Rogues' Castle.
Cave goblin 36 Misthalin✓ Found in Dorgesh-Kaan after completion of Death to the Dorgeshuun.
Master Farmer 38 Up to 115,000 Misthalin✓ Kandarin✓ Rarity increases with the Farming level of the seed.
Guard 40 Asgarnia✓ Misthalin✓ Kandarin✓
Fremennik Citizen 45 Fremennik✓
Bearded Pollnivnian Bandit 45 60,000–90,000 Desert✓
Desert Bandit 53 Desert✓
Knight of Ardougne 55 60,000–240,000 Kandarin✓
Pollnivian Bandit 55 80,000–110,000 Desert✓
Yanille Watchman 65 Kandarin✓
Menaphite Thug 65 180,000–270,000 Desert✓
Paladin 70 Kandarin✓
Gnome 75 Kandarin✓
Hero 80 Kandarin✓
Vyre 82 Morytania✓ Completion of Sins of the Father to access Darkmeyer.
Elf 85 150,000 at 99 Tirannwn✓
TzHaar-Hur 90 240,000 at 99 Karamja✓ Requires a Fire cape to access the inner city of Mor Ul Rek. Ice gloves are recommended to reduce damage taken.
  1. ↑ 1.0 1.1 Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 8 July 2016. (Archived from the original on 20 December 2019.) Mod Ash: "HAM kit doesn't reduce getting caught, but each piece makes you slightly less likely to be ejected after being caught."

Other equipment[edit | edit source]

Item Region Notes
Lockpick Misthalin✓ Only obtainable in the starting area from young implings with level 22 Hunter. May also be obtained from bandits or the Yanille agility dungeon or Martin Thwait's Lost and Found.
H.A.M. robes Misthalin✓ While wearing parts of this outfit, players are slightly less likely to be kicked out of the H.A.M. Hideout when failing to pick the pockets of H.A.M. members, with the effect increasing with the number of pieces worn.
Dodgy necklace Misthalin✓ While equipped, provides a 25% chance to prevent the player from being stunned and damaged while pickpocketing. Has 10 charges. Obtainable with level 16 Crafting and level 7 Magic.
Gloves of silence Kandarin✓ While equipped, reduces a player's chance of failure while pickpocketing by 5%. Degradable and repairable. Requires 54 Hunter to equip. Obtainable with level 57 Hunter. Does not stack with the Ardougne cloak.
Ardougne cloak 3 Kandarin✓ 10% increased chance of succeeding when pickpocketing around Gielinor (even if the cloak is not equipped).
Rogue outfit Asgarnia✓ While wearing pieces of the rogue armour, there is a chance of pickpocketing twice the loot from an NPC, with the full set guaranteeing double loot. Each piece increases the chance of double loot by 20%. Experience drops remain unaffected.

Temporary boosts[edit | edit source]

Item Region Notes
Spicy stew (yellow spice) Desert✓ Boosts Thieving by ±0-5. Requires manual completion of the Freeing Evil Dave subquest in Recipe for Disaster.
Poison chalice Kandarin✓ Boosts Thieving by ±0-1. May inflict damage up to 90% of total HP.
Bandit's brew Desert✓ Boosts Thieving by 1. Only purchasable from The Big Heist Lodge.
Spring sq'irkjuice Desert✓ Boosts Thieving by 1. Obtained with level 25 Thieving from the Sorceress's Garden minigame.
Autumn sq'irkjuice Desert✓ Boosts Thieving by 2. Obtained with level 45 Thieving from the Sorceress's Garden minigame.
Summer sq'irkjuice Desert✓ Boosts Thieving by 3. Obtained with level 65 Thieving from the Sorceress's Garden minigame.

Skillcape[edit | edit source]

Item Region Master Notes
Thieving cape Asgarnia✓ Martin Thwait While equipped, players pickpocketing NPCs will have an additional 10% chance of being successful. This effect stacks multiplicatively with the Ardougne Diary or gloves of silence bonuses.
